findings.title: [P2] Inactivity timer can fire during a new PTT interaction
findings.body: `last_action_at_ms` is only updated on `STAFF_PTT_UP` (and consent button). If a user presses PTT near the 300s timeout, a `TICK` before they release can still see the old timestamp and force a return to ROOM mid-recording, even though activity has started. To avoid premature timeouts, update `last_action_at_ms` when entering `listening` (e.g., on `STAFF_PTT_DOWN`).

overall_explanation: One correctness edge case around inactivity timing during PTT start; otherwise the diff looks consistent with the stated contract.
